title: Plumber

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Inspect. You will learn if they are suspicious or not.
- At night, Rig someone's house. If they kill someone tonight, you will see the blood in their pipes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can't use the same ability two nights in a row.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may prepare to Inspect two players, doing no ability. Tomorrow night, you skip your action to learn if they are suspicious or not.

*There's something strange in your pipes.*
